last_episode_to_air.name: Absolution
last_episode_to_air.overview: Eve must fight or die. Can Eve show her apprentice the humanity that she has learned so that he is not haunted like she is? Can Eve finish off the Downes family or will her quest for vengeance end in failure?

name: Angel of Death
overview: Angel of Death is a web series of eight to ten minute episodes created by Ed Brubaker. The series stars ZoÃ« Bell as Eve, an assassin taking revenge on her former employers, and costars Lucy Lawless. Angel of Death was produced by White Rock Lake Production and distributed by Sony Pictures Television. The episodes were released on Crackle from March 2 to March 13, 2009.

episodes.name: Edge
episodes.overview: Eve is a killer. A killer makes no mistakes and has no conscience or they loose the edge. It's the edge that keeps them one step ahead of their prey, of the law, of their employer. It's the edge that keeps them alive. Eve's still alive. So what the fuck happened? Maybe this means it's time to quit - if she can survive.

episodes.name: Memories
episodes.overview: Dr. Rankin is good doctor. He keeps his mouth shut. Too bad he's a junkie. Hopefully, he can stop the shakes long enough to save Eve. Assassins don't get choice or conscience or do they?

episodes.name: Workday
episodes.overview: Another day, another bullet. The job is simple. Eve's employers don't like complications. As an assassin you are only one phone call away from forced retirement. Your must trusted ally could be your worst enemy.

episodes.name: Made Man
episodes.overview: Arthur Max is a made man. He's untouchable. What the hell is Eve doing paying him a visit? As long as he gives answers everything should be just fine. If not then Eve's not just signing her death warrant but Graham's as well.

episodes.name: Clean Up
episodes.overview: Eve's tied up with a gun to her head. Basically screwed. All she needed is 1 more second. Can she escape? Too bad for her capture she's a good at her job. How the hell is Graham supposed to clean up this mess?

episodes.name: The Family
episodes.overview: Somebody's got to help you out sometime. How can you accept help when you don't know who to trust. There are lines even assassins can't cross. Even the head of the family can't shoot a made man.

episodes.name: Old Man
episodes.overview: Pull the trigger & Eve is free from the nightmares. Can killing right now make up for the killing you've done in the past? It's said mercy is a good thing. A bit of mercy could have just signed Eve's death warrant.

episodes.name: Inocentes
episodes.overview: Every action has a reaction. When you're an assassin though the reaction usually hits the ones you love. No matter how fast you run you can't escape vengeance. Her journey may have started with a unknown little girl but now it is personal.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.overview: Is this justice or revenge? Eve's wades through blood to end what she started. How many have died for Eve to clear her conscience. How many more must she kill? The person between her and the finish line isn't who she expected though.

episodes.name: Absolution
episodes.overview: Eve must fight or die. Can Eve show her apprentice the humanity that she has learned so that he is not haunted like she is? Can Eve finish off the Downes family or will her quest for vengeance end in failure?
